example:
import requests

CLIENT_ID = "CLIENT_ID"
ENVIRONMENT_URL = "ENVIRONMENT_URL"

username = "USERNAME"
api_key = "API_KEY"
process_image_url = '{0}api/v8/partner/documents/'.format(ENVIRONMENT_URL)
headers = {{
 "Content-Type": "application/json",
 "Accept": "application/json", 
 "CLIENT-ID": CLIENT_ID,
 "AUTHORIZATION": "apikey {{0}}:{{1}}".format(username, api_key)
}}

# url path to a file
file_url = 'https://example.com/images/example.jpg'\nfile_name = 'example.jpg'

# You can send the list of categories that is relevant to your case
# Veryfi will try to choose the best one that fits this file
categories = ["Office Expense", "Meals & Entertainment", "Utilities", "Auto"]
payload = {{
 'file_name': file_name,
 'file_url': file_url,
 'categories': categories
}}
response = requests.post(url=process_image_url, headers=headers, json=payload)

print(response.json())

<?php
	$CLIENT_ID = "CLIENT_ID";
	$ENVIRONMENT_URL = "ENVIRONMENT_URL";

	$username = "USERNAME";
	$api_key = "API_KEY";

	# You can send the list of categories that is relevant to your case
	# Veryfi will try to choose the best one that fits this file
	$categories = array("Office Expense", "Meals & Entertainment", "Utilities", "Auto");

	$data = array(
		"file_name" => "example.jpg", 
		"file_url" => "https://example.com/images/example.jpg",
		"categories" => $categories
	);

	$headers = array(
		"Content-Type: application/json",
		"Accept: application/json",
		"AUTHORIZATION: apikey $username:$api_key",
		"CLIENT-ID: $CLIENT_ID"
	);

	$url = "{$ENVIRONMENT_URL}api/v8/partner/documents/";

	$ch = curl_init($url);
	curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HEADER, false);
	curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
	curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
	curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
	curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, json_encode($data));
	$json_response = curl_exec($ch);
	$status = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
	curl_close($ch);

	print("json_response = " . $json_response);
?>

"curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" \ 
		-H "Accept: application/json" \ 
		-H "CLIENT-ID: CLIENT_ID" \ 
		-H "AUTHORIZATION: apikey USERNAME:API_KEY" \ 
		-X POST \ 
		-d '{"file_name": "example.jpg", "file_url": "https://example.com/images/example.jpg"}' \ 
		ENVIRONMENT_URL/api/v8/partner/documents/"
